mapper.select: SELECT p.product_no, pn.product_code, pn.product_name, pn.product_category, pn.product_price, s.sale_no, s.sale_date, s.dept_no, d.dept_name FROM sale s JOIN product p ON s.product_no = p.product_no JOIN product_name pn ON p.product_code = pn.product_code JOIN department d ON s.dept_no = d.dept_no WHERE s.sale_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT count(*) FROM sale s JOIN product p ON s.product_no = p.product_no JOIN product_name pn ON p.product_code = pn.product_code JOIN department d ON s.dept_no = d.dept_no WHERE s.sale_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC

SELECT p.product_no, pn.product_code, pn.product_price, pn.product_name, pn.product_category, s.sale_no, s.sale_date, s.dept_no, d.dept_name FROM sale s JOIN product p ON s.product_no = p.product_no JOIN product_name pn ON p.product_code = pn.product_code JOIN department d ON s.dept_no = d.dept_no WHERE s.sale_date IS NULL ORDER BY s.sale_no ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT count(*) FROM sale s JOIN product p ON s.product_no = p.product_no JOIN product_name pn ON p.product_code = pn.product_code JOIN department d ON s.dept_no = d.dept_no WHERE s.sale_date IS NULL ORDER BY s.sale_no ASC

SELECT s.sale_no, p.product_no, pn.product_code, pn.product_name, pn.product_price, pn.product_category, s.sale_date, s.dept_no, d.dept_name FROM sale s JOIN product p ON s.product_no = p.product_no JOIN product_name pn ON p.product_code = pn.product_code JOIN department d ON s.dept_no = d.dept_no WHERE s.sale_no = #{saleNo}

SELECT product_name, product_code, product_price, sale_date, count(*) AS quantity FROM sale JOIN product USING(product_no) JOIN product_name USING(product_code) WHERE sale_date = #{saleDate} GROUP BY product_name, product_code, product_price, sale_date
